names.english: water and earth two immortals special pill
names.commonEnglish: Water and Earth Immortals Special Pill

actions: Stabilizes the Kidneys, astringes Jing, expels Dampness and stops discharge.
With Jin Ying Zi, for spermatorrhea, urinary frequency, or vaginal discharge due to Kidney Deficiency
Stabilizes Kidneys, astringes urine and retains essence.
